Serialized Form

  • Package contactmanager

    • Class contactmanager.ContactImpl extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          String name

        • notes

          String notes

        • id

          int id

    • Class contactmanager.ContactManagerImpl extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      2L

      • Serialized Fields

        • contacts

          List<E> contacts
          list of Contact 's that have been registered using addNewContact.

        • futureMeetings

          List<E> futureMeetings
          list of future meetings that have been added using addFutureMeetings.

        • pastMeetings

          List<E> pastMeetings
          list of pastMeetings created by addMeetingNotes on a FutureMeeting or by addNewPastMeeting.

        • pretendNow

          Calendar pretendNow
          Normally the real system date time will be used to check whether a meeting is in the future or past. However if pretendNow is not null then this date time will be used instead. Intended for testing.

        • fileSR

          FileSaveRetrieve fileSR
          deals with saving state, fileName, the method, and the methods to do it

    • Class contactmanager.FileSaveRetrieveImpl extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3L

      • Serialized Fields

        • fileName

          String fileName
          name of the file to retrieve-state-from and to save-state-to. The default value "contacts.txt" is that quoted on CourseWork assignment. Set by FileSaveRetrieveImpl.setFileName(String), Get by FileSaveRetrieveImpl.getFileName().

        • serialEncoder

          SerialEncoder serialEncoder
          The encoding to be used for the same to file. This is hard coded here. For development version use XSTREAMXML (better) For "production" (master to-be-marked) version use JOSBASE64 See Project wiki page for a comparison of methods

    • Class contactmanager.FutureMeetingImpl extends MeetingImpl implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

    • Class contactmanager.MeetingImpl extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      2L

      • Serialized Fields

        • id

          int id

        • date

          Calendar date

        • contacts

          List<E> contacts
          although we are supplied contacts as a set the Contact objects are mutable so so storing as a set is problematic. Instead store as a list and convert

    • Class contactmanager.PastMeetingImpl extends MeetingImpl implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • notes

          String notes
